title: Jordan Peterson Phase 3: the Books About Him. Ron Dart
description:
Ron Dart edited a book of essays about Jordan Peterson that is coming out in a couple of weeks. There have been a number out about him which we talk about as well as our hopes for what's coming up for him. 

Ron Dart's 3 Phases of the Jordan Peterson 
1. Jordan Peterson before bill C-16
2. Jordan Peterson on the political stage
3. Books commenting about Jordan Peterson

Myth and Meaning in Jordan Peterson edited by Ron Dart https://amzn.to/2Vn7MrZ
Myth, Meaning and Anti-Fragile Individualism by Mark Campagne https://amzn.to/393pPrc
Savage Messiah Jordan Peterson Bio https://amzn.to/2HZgdBS
Jordanetics by Vox Day https://amzn.to/2T1V4gO
Understanding Jordan Peterson by James Beverley https://amzn.to/2HZGYWS
